message: Let's split it 50/50, no need to negotiate further!
You can have less, I'm the one making the first good offer!
You said I could have less, now it's my turn to take the lead!
You're not serious about taking the lead, are you? I'll give you a bit more, but don't expect it to last!
Time's running out, I'm taking control!
You're getting desperate, I can see it! I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
I'm not desperate, but I'm running out of time!
You're getting closer to getting nothing, but I'm still holding out for a better deal!
I'm running out of options, please make a decision!
You're really running out of time, and I'm not getting any younger! This is my last decent offer, don't blow it!
I'm really running out of time, please accept this!
Fine, I'll take it all. It's now or never!
